title: PGIMER Recruitment 2026 - Apply Offline for Senior Resident Posts
description: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research (PGIMER) has declared the official notification for 2026. To fill up the vacancies for various Senior Resident Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the MD/ MS and DNB can grab this chance and apply for the PGIMER Recruitment 2026 . Here weincluded the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Job...
